mc.name: Soportar la muerte
mc.oracleText: Target creature gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it. If its toughness is 0 or less, it's still put into its owner's graveyard.)

mc.name: Motor sierpespiral
mc.oracleText:
Deathtouch, lifelink
When Wurmcoil Engine dies, put a 3/3 colorless Wurm artifact creature token with deathtouch and a 3/3 colorless Wurm artifact creature token with lifelink onto the battlefield.
mc.text:
Toque mortal, vínculo vital.
